entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\eventsourceerror\\eventsourceerror\\eventsourceerror.cmd #81241
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type cannot delegate derived type declaration to sub-classes #81236
  • [MONO][TEST] Bring up iOS/arm64 and iOSSimulator arm64 Runtime tests in CI #81233
    8.0.0
  • Memory violation/corruption error with sdk7 docker image on M1 MAC #81232
  • Perf summary : Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Formatting.NoArguments #81230
  • FileSystemWatcher stops working after Exception #81226
  • [wasm][perf] Blazor scenarios build can break sometimes #81222
    8.0.0
  • Inefficiencies with IComparer<T>.Compare vs operators #81220
  • Logging isnt shown and exception isnt thrown when using aspnet:6.0.13-alpine3.17-amd64 #81218
  • XmlSerializer: Cannot serialize member because it is an interface #81214
  • InvalidCastException thrown after TimerQueueTimer.CallCallback #81211
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Byte> #81227
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #81228
  • [wasi] Review temp file name generator #81210
    8.0.0
  • Integer.TryParse with Nothing object #81225

Closed

  • BufferBlock<T>.Completion never completes in specific scenario #60768
    Future
  • createdump not running on segfault #81184
    8.0.0
  • Getting MetadataType attributes through MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(true) #81089
  • Deadlock when recursive resolving scoped services from another thread #80697
  • ILVerify fails to verify code that passes Nullable<T> to parameter with unmanaged constraint #81177
  • [API Proposal]: FrozenDictionary/Set.ToFrozen* overloads that take optimization level #81088
    8.0.0
  • Add slim dedicated implementation of Parallel loop APIs #57580
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\ObjectStackAllocation\\ObjectStackAllocationTests\\ObjectStackAllocationTests.cmd #81103
    8.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests SIGABRT on release mono OSX x64 Debug #60088
    Future
  • Expose GetPipePath on System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream #28979
    Future
  • [linux-arm64] Random and rare runtime crash System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException (System.Net.Sockets) #72365
    Future
  • Path.GetTempFileName() sometimes fails on WASM due to insufficient randomness #73721
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock when competing threads are locking on multiple objects #81199
  • [API Proposal]: IFloatingPointIeee754<T>.Lerp #80044
  • Missing mscordbi.dll 4.0.30319.0 from symbol servers #81167
  • [wasm] Split initial SIMD implementation draft PR #70085
    8.0.0
  • X86 Assert failure - `baseservices\\callconvs\\TestCallingConventions\\TestCallingConventions.cmd` #80583
    8.0.0
  • No-op EventListener + idle Web app = 190 MB/h native memory leak #80684
    8.0.0
  • Improve build error when python isn't installed #72395
    Future
  • SortedList<> Enumerator is allocated on the heap #81128
  • JIT should optimize {array | span}.Length division by constant that is power of 2 #59922
    8.0.0
  • Performance issues with Range type #11848
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix special sweep issue for workstation #81248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • JIT: update `fgReplaceJumpTarget` to maintain pred lists #81246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable eventsourceerror test for Windows ARM32 #81244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `printf` implementation #81243
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Preference LIR edges away from killed registers #81242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling of load when only `DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory` is specified #81240
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make a number of improvements to the System.Text.Json source generator #81239
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #81238
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • Update emsdk manifest dependency name to Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscr… #81235
    arch-wasm, area-workloads
  • Skip failing System.Diagnostics.Process tests #81231
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [Android] Fix SslStream IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Android API 21-27 #81224
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [browser] PGO AOT samples #81221
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Align simd types to 16 bytes by default #81219
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Avoid xchg for resolution #81216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add @kotlarmilos as code owner #81209
    area-Meta
  • NativeAOT: Loop alignment support for xarch #81206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix nullability on `IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer` #81203
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Improve error for missing Python #81202
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove defensive Task[] copy from non-generic Task.WhenAll #81065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81050
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add Vector.Normalize measurement #81237
  • JIT: build pred lists before patchpoint expansion #81196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #81013
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid saving the result of OP_AOTCONST into the gc pin a… #81179
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Disable the /JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests #81195
    area-Meta
  • Updating JitInterface to support Vector512. #81197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a variety of issues in FrozenCollections #81194
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix max chunk size limiting #81192
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix missing simd mul/div case #81201
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Always allocate when computing temp path #81085
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Extract code outside of interp main loop #81208
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add SYSLIB* analyzers to global configs #80930
    area-Meta
  • Add Lerp to IFloatingPointIeee754 #81186
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix GC interfaces versioning #81188
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix CA2021 in MethodBodyScanner #81200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • BrowserDebugProxy: unify debug metadata reading for PE and Webcil #81099
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update the JIT to track `Span.Length` and `ReadOnlySpan.Length` as "never negative" #81055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add Current to the name of the workload manifest #80401
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Publish `UpDownCounter` and `ObservableUpDownCounter` Events for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #81041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80939
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] CoreCLR initialization failures logging #81134
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix use-after-free in EventPipe #81135
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid creating stores to dead fields in block morphing #81095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #81101
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #81077
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.4
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(string, string, ...) #81098
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Disposed change token registration should not raise consumer #79966
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change Source link version number refs to new properties #81190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Improve -static-pie support #81163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80872
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • [browser] no posix socks emulation #81182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Add an AzDO pipeline to run tests on emulators running all supported Android API levels #80925
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [eventpipe] Support arrays of primitive types as struct members #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Introduce insGroup/instrDesc backwards navigation #80840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81139
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • [JIT] Remove duplicate 'cmp' instruction in specific comparison scenario #81143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Runtime tests generate a significant number of warnings #2165

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Testing ns2.0 libraries, ambiguous reference issues #30151
  • dotnet watch run --no-hot-reload stops watching for file changes #30140
  • `dotnet workload` design documentations are quite out of date #30131
  • `dotnet workload` should automatically update workloads on a fresh install #30130

Closed

  • Build Output glitches on non-English locales #30143

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to osx 12 #30149
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor CSharpSyntaxWrite. Introduce OneLineStatementSyntaxRewriter, FieldDeclarationSyntaxRewriter. Add Tests for SyntaxRewriter(s). #30141
    Area-GenAPI
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • add named monitor for fixing floating tests #30138
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update linker team name #30152
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make error optional in ApiSymbolExtensions logger #30102
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add tests to verify analyzer configuration with analysis properties #30115

Updated

  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2097880 #30128
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DO NOT MERGE] add workaround for fixing floating tests #30117

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Publish notes for roles WG 2023-01-25 #6919

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FAR doesn't list all references from file linked into multiple project #66558
  • Variables captured in a lambda and in a local function are getting different treatment in DefiniteAssignmentPass #66557
  • An exception is thrown when getting the compilation. #66556

Closed

  • Roslyn fails to correctly infer nullable annotations in list patterns' variables #65976
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits accessibility level for accessors #66379
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Inline diagnostics - integration tests #66563
    Area-IDE
  • Update capabilities for streaming references #66562
    Area-IDE
  • Update BCL versions to .NET 7 #66561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not restrict field locations to the same document for "Replace with autoproperty" refactoring #66555
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Complete interpolated raw string when more than one dollar sign #66554
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Introduce parser helper for parsing separated syntax lists. #66552
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce delegate allocations in LanguageParser #66551
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66549
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Don't overwrite binary logs #66559
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Correctly emit accessibility when generating properties via `SyntaxGenerator` #66543
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Disregard static abstract methods as entrypoint candidates #66525
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for brace pair highlighting for C# and VB (F#/TS can add support as well if desired). #66348
    Area-IDE
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Simplify GlobalKeywordRecommender #65814
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Report example of unanalyzed node in `NullableWalker` #66385
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Obsolete `ISourceGenerator` APIs #66462
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Test/implement some aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66499
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Add F1 test for scoped #64094
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • ignore top level statements from move static member refactoring #61227
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IExceptionHandler for exception handler middleware #46280
  • Support metadata generation in RequestDelegate generator #46277
    8.0-preview2
  • Support response writing in RequestDelegateGenerator #46276
    8.0-preview2
  • Support parameter-binding scenarios in RequestDelegateGenerator #46275
  • Identity schema versioning design / infrastructure #46274
    8.0-preview2
  • Add JwtBearerOptions to achieve Multi-Tanency in AspNetCore During Runtime #46281
  • Don't warn on `app.UseEndpoints(e => {});` in RouteHandlerAnalyzer #46270
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add NamedPipeTransportOptions.ListenerQueueCount property #46268
    8.0-preview2
  • [AOT] Improve Results<...>.PopulateMetadata implementation #46267

Closed

  • [AOT] ProblemDetails and Extension values #45862
    .NET 8 Planning
  • error NETSDK1047: Assets file 'project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net7.0/linux-x64' #45049
  • InferParameterBindingInfoConvention ignores property's binding source attributes #46140
    8.0-preview2
  • RequireLocalPort extension for IEndpointConventionBuilder #46057
    Backlog
  • FileStreamResultExecutor does not write Content-Length, also when Length is known #46149
    Backlog
  • Provide access to configuring the SecurityStampValidator from IdentityBuilder #42749
    .NET 8 Planning
  • IIS with Blazor Webassembly ASP hosted application throws Exception trying to retrieve data from SQL Server (api calls) #45670
  • [AOT] React to DependencyInjection requires dynamic code changes #45861
    8.0-preview1
  • Setting `DefaultScheme` in authentication configuration is not working #46232
  • Consider Integrating IResult into the request pipeline #37851
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Planning for Minimal APIs in .NET 7 #36770
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `[FromRoute]` does not work when used as model property, not as action parameter. #45392
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow abbreviated namespaces in components #46254
  • Azure AD and Azure AD B2C application roles using Application role manager with Microsoft Identity platform #46130
  • UseTokenLifeTime behavior clarification after testing #37087
    Discussions
  • Xamarin Android & Websockets #41835
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Linux: RBAC claims resolution fails if user has group with comma in name #45648
    8.0-preview2
  • Allow `NameClaimType`/`RoleClaimType` to be configured with the authentication configuration provider #46221
  • Unable to UnProtect payloads protected with a key which is still not expired #45763

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2097875 #46279
    area-infrastructure
  • [Draft] Do a test run on new Debian12 image #46273
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Evaluate BoundProperties when inferring BindindSource #46228
    8.0-preview1
  • Avoid a state machine allocation in EndpointMiddleware #46271
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.39
  • Adding ILLink.Substituions.xml EmbeddedResource #46265
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Consistently return StringValues.Empty instead of default for missing headers #46226
    area-runtime
  • Install VS Community by default #46262
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Change IsTfaEnabled to IsTwoFactorEnabledAsync #46258
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve IIS error when wrong application path #46249
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Multiple accept loops in named pipes transport #46259
    area-runtime
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, .NET 8 Planning
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Update SOS command docs with newly supported Linux/MacOS commands #3395
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main to eventPipeMeters #3617
  • Remove duplicate SOS command docs #3612
  • Fix/disable nullable warnings treated as errors with newer SDKs installed #3616

Updated

  • Add support for System.Diagnostics.Metrics in dotnet-monitor's collector #3587

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor Publish is taking a very long time #12948
  • [Not Planned] Work required to better enable adding platforms to MAUI #12947
    Backlog
  • Android Net8.0 Publish failing with error XAGJS7023: System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #12945
  • MAUI_splashscreen: How to set Splash screen for Light and Dark mode for iOS and Android #12944
  • Performance degradation when navigating to a page and going back several times #12930
    Backlog
  • Add support for Background image with ImageBrush #12928
    Backlog
  • Random images shown in Image class on Android #12923
    Backlog
  • CollectionView: ScrollTo item when setting SelectedItem #12920
    Backlog
  • "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.ShellFlyoutItemView" is reported to screen readers instead of the shown text - poor accessibility #12919
  • Add a splash screen to a .NET MAUI app project on per-platform approaches #12917
  • [Maps] [Regression from Xamarin.Forms.Maps] Changing Location on a Pin does nothing #12916
    Backlog
  • [Regression from Xamarin Forms] CarouselView does not update view when current item changes programmatically #12915
    Backlog
  • MAUI should expose x:Name as AutomationId to accessibility tools (like VS accessibility checker) #12913

Closed

  • Titlebar Translucent Issue When Switching the Root to Shell #10573
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • MAUI need Canvas layout like WPF or UWP #12862
  • Infinite recursion during resource lookup within System.Private.CoreLib #12826
  • [Windows] ContentPage BackgroundColor Transparent not working #12926
    Backlog
  • $SolutionDir incorrectly maps to $ProjectDir when deploying to iOS (simulator) #7534
  • Problem encountered on MAUI first app tutorial device Emulator setup. #12763
  • MAUI app build on long path not working #12777
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10386
    Backlog
  • Lowercase char in Entry with TextTransform=Uppercase moves cursor to the beginning #11313
    Backlog
  • HTML5 video not working on MAUI WebView #4807
    Backlog
  • Picker and Switch BackgroundColor properties are not updated from ViewModel #12749
    Backlog
  • Maui Android Crash: Canvas: trying to draw too large(106099200bytes) bitmap. #12641
  • ImageSource.FromResource random image... #12701
  • On Android only, buttons inside grid stays invisible after grid visibility changes to true #8574
  • [Android 13] - MediaPicker - Permissions issue #11211
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI does not work with Android 13 Android.permission.write_external_storage #11275
    Backlog
  • Windows Application Package build error Microsoft.DesktopBridge.targets(744,5): error : Specified EntryPointExe '' was not found in the project outputs. #12729

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more BlazorWebView device tests #12946

    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] Use relative X position of tap when determining if the button was hit #12936
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12935
    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12934
    area/Xaml </>
  • [net7.0] Flag valid measure status in iOS backing views to avoid repeat measuring #12933

  • [Windows] Close the WebView2 disconnecting the Handler #12925
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate is not working with Sqlite #30155
  • ORA-01460: unimplemented or unreasonable conversion requested for more than 32kb size string even after giving conversion #30153
  • How to disable plan caching #30152
  • How to add conventions by assembly instead of manually setting them up in ConfigureConventions #30150
  • ExecuteUpdate: Add SetProperty overload that accepts a property name or property info directly (no lambda) #30149
  • When did we get support for extension functions(mehods) inside IQueriable.Select ? #30148
  • How to fix up navigation collection without reloading? #30147
  • Map EntityType to IQueryable #30146
  • Be more forgiving on DbContext name for migrations #30145

Closed

  • EF Core Columns With User Defined Data Type w/Defaults Not Generated #30151
  • Issue on managing one-to-one relationships #30084
  • How do I find related types of a changetracker join entity entry #30106

PullRequests

Created

  • Adds wildcard context naming to FindContextType #30156
  • Update Cosmos tests log location #30154

Merged

  • Fix to #29667 - Count after Take throws "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'." #30134
  • Document that HasMaxLength(-1) means no maximum length #30137
  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Working implementation of precompiled queries #29949
  • Support for DateOnly/TimeOnly for SQL Server #30109
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29667 - Count after Take throws "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'." #30144
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.4
